Class Utilities

extends java.lang.Object
    The Utilities class contains methods needed throughout the entire program that need or are used to assist in more important tasks

      • getQRScore

        public static int getQRScore​(java.lang.String hash)
        This function obtains a score for a scanned QR Code
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash value of a scanned QR code
        Returns:
        the score assigned to a particular QR Code

      • hashQRCode

        public static java.lang.String hashQRCode​(java.lang.String contents)
                                   throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Obtains a SHA-256 hash for provided QR Code contents
        Parameters:
        contents - ohe contents of the QR Code as a String of characters
        Returns:
        the SHA-256 hash for a QR Code
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Throws such an exception when a "SHA-256" algorithm is not found in getInstance

      • getQRCodeName

        public static java.lang.String getQRCodeName​(java.lang.String hash,
                                             java.lang.String[] adjectives,
                                             java.lang.String[] colors,
                                             java.lang.String[] nouns)
        Assigns a unique name to a QR code based on it's hash
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash of the given QR code
        adjectives - the list of adjectives to choose from for the QR code name
        colors - the list of colors to choose from for the QR code name
        nouns - the list of nouns to choose from for the QR code name
        Returns:
        the name generated from the QR code's hash

      • retrieveFileData

        public static java.lang.String[] retrieveFileData​(android.content.res.Resources resources,
                                                  int length,
                                                  int file)
        Retrieves data from a file for MainActivity
        Parameters:
        resources - references the resources in AndroidStudio project
        length - length of the data file/max # of elements that can be read
        Returns:
        a string array of file elements, at most 'length' of them

      • getDeviceId

        public static java.lang.String getDeviceId​(androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity app)
        This function returns the ID of the android device
        Parameters:
        app - references the activity that needs to access the device ID
        Returns:
        the ID of the android device

      • saveToInternalStorage

        public static java.lang.String saveToInternalStorage​(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmapImage,
                                                     android.content.Context context,
                                                     java.lang.String img_file_name)
        Saves the image to internal storage, in other words, saves the image to a path in the users device that is called upon each time we need that image
        Parameters:
        bitmapImage - the bitmap of the image selected by the user
        context - the context of the application at time of method call
        img_file_name - the name of the image file provided (something like image.png)
        Returns:
        the absolute path in the user's device to the image for future usages

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentDate()
        This function returns the current date in yyyy-MM-dd format
        Returns:
        the current date in yyyy-MM-dd format
